Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add multi-carrier support, staff permissions, and admin portal improvements

- Add Carrier model for multi-carrier management \(Delhivery, DTDC variants\)
- Update RateCard model with carrier_id, versioning, and effective dates
- Add carrier management API routes \(CRUD, rates, activate/deactivate\)
- Create AdminCarriers and AdminCarrierRates pages for carrier rate management
- Add staff permissions system with granular menu and action access
- Create staffPermissions middleware for backend authorization
- Update AdminStaffManagement with permission editor modal
- Add all shipping status filters to AdminOrders \(12 statuses\)
- Add customer name/contact columns and status badges to orders table
- Add Generate Monthly Billing feature to AdminBilling
- Update AdminRateCard with carrier grid view and A-Z/Z-A sorting
- Remove emojis from admin pages \(tickets, client dashboard, layout\)
- Add migration script for existing Delhivery data

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
